where.label: wr1
where.expression: sizeof ( query ( sar <* usedin ( self , 'part_feature_function_mim.' + 'shape_aspect_relationship.relating_shape_aspect' ) | ( sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'interface_access area' ) and ( sar . related_shape_aspect \ shape_aspect . description = 'connection zone' ) ) ) = 1

where.label: wr1
where.expression: sizeof ( query ( sar <* usedin ( self , 'part_feature_function_mim.' + 'shape_aspect_relationship.relating_shape_aspect' ) | ( sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'mating area' ) and ( sar . related_shape_aspect \ shape_aspect . description = 'connection zone' ) ) ) = 1

where.label: wr1
where.expression: sizeof ( query ( sar <* usedin ( self , 'part_feature_function_mim.' + 'shape_aspect_relationship.relating_shape_aspect' ) | ( sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'mounting area' ) and ( sar . related_shape_aspect \ shape_aspect . description = 'connection zone' ) ) ) = 1
